div.a: Online Grade and Lunch Account Access

br.p: How are your child's grades? Need to know your child's lunch account balance? Click HERE to access R-P's Online Grades and lunch accounts! STUDENTS: Click here to check your grades. If you need your user ID and password to view your students' grades online contact Holly Ekern at hollyekern@r-pschools.com.
